member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.CRM2011_Utilites.Crm2011AccessUtils
member.summary: This class acts as an interface layer to talk to the Xrm.Page Object in the CRM browser. It will also provide Prebuilt Hooks to talk to the UII javaScript Lib.
